synopsis.text:
Expo 1970 is back in Khazu City, rekindling the nostalgia of the 20th century in the form of a museum. Adults, entranced by the chance to relive their childhood dreams, flock to the museum, leaving their children behind. Little do they know, the museum's curators harbor a sinister plan: to erase their adult memories and keep them trapped in the past forever.

Enter Shinnosuke, a young boy who must navigate this bizarre turn of events. With his friends by his side, he embarks on a mission to save his parents and thwart the curators' scheme, known as Yesterday Once More. The stakes are high, as the fate of the entire world hangs in the balance. Can Shinnosuke and his friends restore their parents' memories and bring them back to the 21st century before it's too late? Join them on this thrilling adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
